S03n250:3: bodhisattvaḥ kila śrīmati himavatkukṣau vividharasaviryavipākaguṇairbahubhiroṣadhiviśeṣaiḥ parigṛhītabhūmibhāge nāṇāvidhapuṣpaphalapallavapatraviṭaparaparacanairmahīruhaśatairākīrṇe sphaṭikadalāmalasalilaprasravaṇe vividhapakṣigaṇanādanādite vānarayūthādhipatirbabhūva |
S03n250:5: sa tatra mahāntaṃ nyagrodhapādapaṃ parvataśikharamiva vyomollikhantamadhipatimiva tasya vanasya meghasaṃghātamiva pratyandhakāraviṭapamākīrṇaparṇatayā tālaphalādhikatarapramāṇaiḥ paramasvādubhirmanojñavarṇagandhaiḥ phalaviśeṣairānamyamānaśākhaṃ niśritya vijahāra |
S03n250:8: tasya tu vanaspaterekā śākhā tatsamīpagāṃ nimnagāmabhi praṇatābhavat |
S03n250:9: atha bodhisattvo dīrghadarśitvāttadvānarayūthaṃ samanuśaśāsa - asyāṃ nyogrodhaśākhāyāmaphalāyāmakṛtāyāṃ na vaḥ kena cidanyataḥ phalamupabhoktavyamiti |
S03n250:10: atha kadācittasyāṃ śākhāyāṃ pipīlikābhiḥ parṇapuṭāvacchāditaṃ taruṇatvānnātimahadekaṃ phalaṃ na te vānarā dadṛśuḥ |
S03n250:11: tatkrameṇābhivardhamānaṃ varṇagandharasamārdavopapannaṃ paripākavaśācchithilabandhanaṃ tasyāṃ nadyāṃ nipapāta |
S03n250:12: anupūrveṇa vāhyamāna nadīstrotasā'nyatamasya rājñaḥ sāntaḥpurasya tasyāṃ nadyāṃ salilakrīḍāmanubhavato jālakaraṇḍakapārśve vyāsajyata |
S03n250:17: kaūtuhalaprasṛtalolataranayanāstu tā yoṣitastannyagrodhaphalaṃ paripakvatālaphalādhikatarapramāṇaṃ jālakaraṇḍakapārśvato vilagnamavekṣya kimidamiti tadāvarjitanayanāḥ samapdyanta saha rājñā |
S03n250:18: atha sa rājā tatphalamānāyya prātyayikavaidyajanaparidṛṣṭaṃ svayamāsvādayāmāsa |
S03n250:23: atha tasya rājñaḥ svādurasabhojanasamucitasyāpi tadrasasaṃrāgavaśagasyaitada bhavat-
S03n250:24: yo nāma nāmūni phalāni bhuṅkte sa kāni rājyasya phalāni bhuṅkte |
S03n250:25: yasyānnametattu ca eva rājā vinaiva rājatvapariśrameṇa ||6 ||
S03n250:26: sa tatprabhavānveṣaṇakṛtamatiḥ svabuddhyā vimamarśa-vyaktamayaṃ taruvara ito nātidūre nadītīrasaṃniviṣṭaśca yasyedaṃ phalam ! tathā hyanupahatavarṇagandharasamadīrghakālasalilasaṃparkādaparikṣatamajarjaraṃ ca yataḥ śakyamasya prabhavo'dhigantumiti niścayamupetya tadrasatṛṣṇayā ākṛṣyamāṇo viramya jalakrīḍāyāḥ samyak puravare sve rakṣāvidhānaṃ saṃdiśya yātrāsajjena mahatā balakāyena parivṛtastāṃ nadīmanusasāra |
S03n250:27: krameṇa cotsādayan saśvāpadagaṇāni vanagahanāni samanubhavaṃ ścatrāṇi rasāntarāṇi paśyannakṛtrimaramaṇīyaśobhāni vanāntarāṇi saṃtrāsayan paṭaharasitairavanyagajamṛgān mānuṣajanadurgamaṃ tasya vanaspateḥ samīpamupajagāma |
S03n250:30: paripakvasahakāraphalasurabhitareṇa ca nirhāriṇā atimanojñena gandhena pratyudgata iva tasya pādapasya ayaṃ sa vanaspatiriti niścayamupajagāma |
S03n250:32: atha sa rājā samabhilaṣitārthavipralopinastān vānarān pratyabhikruddhamatiḥ-hata hataitān |
S03n250:33: vidhvaṃsayata vināśayata sarvān vānarajālmāniti saparuṣākṣaraṃ svān puruṣānādideśa |
S03n250:34: atha te rājapuruṣāḥ sajyacāpabāṇavyagrakarāgrā vānarāvabhartsanamukharāḥ samudyataloṣṭadaṇḍaśastrāścāpare paradurgamivābhiroddhukāmāstaṃ vanaspatimabhisasruḥ |
S03n250:35: atha bodhisattvastumulaṃ tadrājabalamanilajavākalitamivārṇavajalamanibhṛtakalakalārāvamabhipatadālokyāśanivarṣeṇeva samantato vikīryamāṇaṃ taruvaraṃ śaraloṣṭadaṇḍaśastravarṣeṇa bhayavirasavirāvamātraparāyaṇaṃ ca vikṛtadīnamukhamunmukhaṃ vānaragaṇamavekṣya mahatyā karuṇayā samākramyamāṇacetāstyaktaviṣādadainyasaṃtrāsaḥ samāśvāsya tadvānarayūthaṃ tatparitrāṇavyavasitamatirabhiruhya tasya vanaspateḥ śikharaṃ tatsamāsannaṃ giritaṭaṃ laṅghayitumiyeṣa |
S03n250:36: athānekapraskandanakramaprāpyamapi taṃ giritaṭaṃ sa mahāsattvaḥ svavīryātiśayātkhaga ivādhiruroha |
S03n250:39: kṛpayābhivivardhitaḥ sa tasya vyavasāyaḥ paṭutāṃ jagāma śauryāt |
S03n250:40: sa ca yatnaviśeṣamasya cakre manasaivātha jagāma yatnataikṣṇyāt ||9 ||
S03n250:41: adhiruhya ca gireruccataraṃ tātapradeśaṃ tadantarālādhikapramāṇayā mahatyā virūḍhayā'śithilamūlayā dṛḍhayā vetralatayā gāḍhamābadhya caraṇau punastaṃ vanaspatiṃ pracaskandaḥ |
S03n250:42: viprakṛṣṭatvāttu tasyāntarālasya caraṇabandhanavyākulatvācca sa mahāsattvaḥ kathaṃcittasya vanaspateragraśākhāṃ karābhyāṃ samāsasāda |
S03n250:43: tataḥ samālambya dṛḍhaṃ sa śākhāmātatya tāṃ vetralatāṃ ca yatnāt |
S03n250:47: gātraṃ yayau svaiḥ piśitairviyogaṃ na tveva dhairyātiśayena cetaḥ ||11 ||
S03n250:48: taddṛṣṭvā sa rājā te ca rājapuruṣāḥ parāṃ vismayavaktavyatāmupajagmuḥ |
S03n250:51: atha sa rājā tān puruṣān samādideśa-bhayodbhrāntavānaragaṇacaraṇakṣobhitakṣataśarīraściramekakramāvasthānācca dṛḍhaṃ pariśrānto vyaktamayaṃ vānarādhipatiḥ na cāya mataḥ śakṣyati svayamātmānaṃ saṃhartum,
S03n250:52: tacchrīghramasyādhaḥ paṭavitānaṃ vitatya vitralateyaṃ ca nyagrodhaśākhā śārābhyāṃ yugapatpracchidyetāmiti |
S03n250:54: athainaṃ sa rājā śanakairvitānādavatārya murchayā vraṇavedanāklamopajātayā samākramyamāṇacetasaṃ mṛduni śayanīye saṃveśayāmāsa |
S03n250:55: sadyaḥkṣatapraśamanayogyaiśca sarpirādibhirasya vraṇānyabhyajya mandībhūtapariśramaṃ samāśvastamenamabhyupagamya sa rājā sakautūhalavismayabahumānaḥ kuśalaparipraśnapūrvakamuvāca-
S03n250:56: gatvā svayaṃ saṃkramatāmamīṣāṃ svajīvite tyaktadayena bhutvā |
S03n250:57: samuddhṛtā ye kapayastvayeme ko nu tvameṣāṃ tava vā ka ete ||13 ||
S03n250:60: atha bodhisattvastasya rājñastadabhyupapattisaumukhyaṃ pratipūjayannātmanivedanamanuguṇena krameṇa cakāra-
S03n250:65: tacchrutvā sa rājā paraṃ vismayamupetya punarenamuvāca-
S03n250:73: idaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā vyasanārtidainyaṃ śākhāmṛgān pratyabhivardhamānam |
S03n250:80: tataḥ karābhyāṃ samavāpamasya prasāritaṃ prasāritaṃ pāṇimivāgraśākhām ||22 ||
S03n250:81: samātatāṅgaṃ latayā tayā ca śākṣāgrahastena ca pādapasya |
S03n250:82: amī madadhyākramaṇe viśaṅkā niśritya māṃ svasti gatāḥ svayūthyāḥ ||23 ||
S03n250:83: atha sa rājā pramodyajātaṃ tasyāmapyavasthāyāṃ taṃ mahāsattvamavekṣya paraṃ vismayamudvahan punarenamuvāca-
S03n250:85: ityātmani samāropya prāptaḥ ko bhavatā guṇaḥ ||24 ||
S03n250:87: kāmaṃ śarīraṃ kṣitipa kṣataṃ me manaḥ parasvāsthyamupāgataṃ tu |
S03n250:90: vīrā yathā vikramacihnaśobhāṃ prītyā tathemāṃ rujamudvahāmi ||26 ||
S03n250:93: tanmāṃ tapatyeṣa na duḥkhayogaḥ suhṛdviyogaḥ sukhaviplavo vā |
S03n250:94: krameṇa cānena amabhyupeto mahotsavābhyāgama eṣa mṛtyuḥ ||28 ||
S03n250:96: pūjā nṛpānnirbhayatā ca mṛtyoḥ kṛtajñabhāvād grahaṇaṃ ca satsu ||29 ||
S03n250:97: ete guṇāḥ sadguṇavāsavṛkṣa prāptā mayaitad vyasanaṃ prapadya |
S03n250:98: eṣāṃ vipakṣāṃstu samabhyupaiti dayāvihīno nṛpatiḥ śriteṣu ||30 ||
S03n250:100: gatirbhavettasya ca nama kānyā jvālākulebhyo narakānalebhyaḥ ||31 ||
S03n250:102: dharmeṇa tasmādanuśādhi rājyaṃ strīcañcalapremaguṇā hi lakṣmīḥ ||32 ||
S03n250:104: sarvān sukhena prayateta yoktuṃ hitānukūlena piteva rājā ||33 ||
S03n250:105: evaṃ hi dharmārthayaśaḥsamṛddhiḥ syātte sukhāyeha paratra caiva |
S03n250:107: iti nṛpamanuśiṣya śisyavad bahumatavākprayatena tena saḥ |
S03n250:111: na samarthāstathā svārthamapi pratipattuṃ sattvā yathā parārthaṃ pratipannavān sa bhagavāniti tathāgatavarṇe'pi vācyam |
